trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a list that is displayed when the user clicks a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示当用户单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> 时，使用户可以从列表中选择单个项的控件。

trans-unit.source: Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> replace and add functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 取代了以前版本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> 控件并向其中添加了功能，但是也可选择保留 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> 以备向后兼容和供将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> to display drop-down lists of options, such as a color picker.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>要显示的选项，如颜色选取器下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> classes to make a three-button color picker that changes the foreground color of the form.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control should automatically close when it has lost activation.

trans-unit.source: If you want a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> that always stays open, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>，始终保持打开状态，请将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: Consider handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> event instead of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>事件而不是设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box keys, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 消息以处理对话框键，例如选项卡、 返回、 转义符，和箭头键在预处理期间调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.ProcessDialogKey%2A> simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.ProcessDialogKey%2A>只需将字符发送到父级的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以使控件有机会处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 方法应确定控件是否处于处理助记键的状态，以及是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法的实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法来确定给定的字符是否与助记键在控件的文本相匹配。

trans-unit.target: 这种默认实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>方法只返回`false`以指示该控件具有没有助记键。
